data.name: Duck Simulator 2
data.detailed_description:
Duck Simulator 2 is a genre-defying game where you will hop between different games in an attempt to find an evil rubber duck that is attempting to ruin the developer's game!

You'll begin by quacking your way through a clicker game, but before you know it the rubber duck will go rogue and completely destroy it! From there, the developer will create several different games (each with a varying genre) for you to complete while they try to find out what went wrong with the original game. So one moment you may be shooting red capsules, but in the next you could be hopping between islands whilst trying not to fall into the void!

Features
  • Four different types of games within the campaign
  • Includes a remaster of the original Duck Simulator
  • An original soundtrack
  • Completely free
data.about_the_game:
Duck Simulator 2 is a genre-defying game where you will hop between different games in an attempt to find an evil rubber duck that is attempting to ruin the developer's game!

You'll begin by quacking your way through a clicker game, but before you know it the rubber duck will go rogue and completely destroy it! From there, the developer will create several different games (each with a varying genre) for you to complete while they try to find out what went wrong with the original game. So one moment you may be shooting red capsules, but in the next you could be hopping between islands whilst trying not to fall into the void!

data.short_description: A genre-defying phenomenon that will take you on a journey to stop a rubber duck from taking over the developer's game!
data.reviews:
“This game is incredibly thought provoking and I cannot describe in words how much I have enjoyed this masterpiece. When I had first started playing this unexpected work of art, I did not think of it as much. The twist had really gotten me hooked and lead me to complete the entire game. Thank you Orius, I have become a better man ever since I have finished this almost inexplicable, beautiful game. This has to be the creator's magnum opus.”
10/10 – Qcumber

“Good game!”
10/10 – philbert

“Makes me excited to see more from this creator! Loved the game, incredible replay value, amazing graphics, just an overall joy.”
9/10 – geese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

highlighted.name: I Can't Believe It's Not Pizza
